§ 413. Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff The Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff are entitled to the allowances provided by law for the Chief of Staff of the Army. (Pub. L. 87–649, Sept. 7, 1962, 76 Stat. 476; Pub. L. 100–180, div. A, title XIII, § 1314(c)(1), Dec. 4, 1987, 101 Stat. 1176.)
